app_descript:
Its My Birthday!

Brief

Celebrate your special day in style with It's My Birthday! - the ultimate app designed to help you discover free gifts near you while ensuring you never miss another birthday of your loved ones. With a user-friendly interface, this app simplifies birthday management and gift-giving, allowing you to focus on the fun!

üìå Core Features

  • Find Free Gifts Nearby: Discover local businesses offering complimentary gifts on your birthday. üéÅ
  • Contact Management: Save notes about your contacts‚Äô interests to help with gift-giving. üìù
  • Age Tracking: Instantly see how old your friends and family are turning this year. üéÇ
  • Default Reminders: Set up reminders that apply to all contacts so you never forget a birthday. ‚è∞
  • Seamless Syncing: Sync birthday notes and gift information across all your devices effortlessly. üîÑ
